main.bio: I am a passionate and driven undergraduate student pursuing a degree in Computer Science at KL University Hyderabad. With a strong academic foundation, practical experience, and a desire to make a meaningful impact, I am eager to contribute my skills and knowledge in Computer Science to address real-world challenges..
main.contactmessage: Thank you for taking the time to review my profile.I am eager to connect with professionals in the field and explore opportunities for collaboration. If my skills resonate with your organization's needs, please reach out using the provided contact information. I look forward to engaging in meaningful discussions.

resume.skillmessage: I am an undergraduate student equipped with a diverse skill set that includes strong analytical abilities, effective communication skills, adaptability, attention to detail, teamwork, time management, and problem-solving capabilities. With a proactive and eager-to-learn mindset, I am prepared to contribute to your organization's success and thrive in a dynamic and collaborative environment.

achievement.text: I got a gold medal in District Level Swimming under-13.
I have participated in Technical event conducted in the college, I have made a Smart irrigation System which supplies water to all the plants according to the soil moisture.

I have participated in Engineering Projects in Community Service(EPICS) conducted in the college, Me and My team have made a Density Based Traffic Management System which works according to the density of Vehicles present in each lane.
I have Participated in ICACIA Confernce and yet to publish a Literature Review on Density Based Traffic Management System.
